Skip to contents
ravemanager 1.0.16
  • Reference

    Get system requirements for 'RAVE'

    system_requirements.Rd

    Get system requirements for 'RAVE'

    Usage

    system_requirements(os, os_release = NULL, curl = Sys.which("curl"), ...)

    Arguments

    os, os_release

    operating system and release version, see https://github.com/rstudio/r-system-requirements#operating-systems

    curl

    the location of the curl binary on your system

    ...

    reserved for future use

    Examples

    


# Please check your operating system & version!!!

# =============== On Ubuntu Linux ===============

# Ubuntu 20
ravemanager::system_requirements("ubuntu", "20")
#> # Please consider the following system libraries under ubuntu-20
#> apt-get install -y make
#> apt-get install -y cmake
#> apt-get install -y libicu-dev
#> apt-get install -y zlib1g-dev
#> apt-get install -y libcurl4-openssl-dev
#> apt-get install -y libssl-dev
#> apt-get install -y libfontconfig1-dev
#> apt-get install -y libfreetype6-dev
#> apt-get install -y libfribidi-dev
#> apt-get install -y libharfbuzz-dev
#> apt-get install -y libjpeg-dev
#> apt-get install -y libpng-dev
#> apt-get install -y libtiff-dev
#> apt-get install -y pandoc
#> apt-get install -y libxml2-dev
#> apt-get install -y git
#> apt-get install -y libgit2-dev
#> apt-get install -y libfftw3-dev
#> apt-get install -y libhdf5-dev
#> apt-get install -y libglpk-dev
#> apt-get install -y libgmp3-dev
#> apt-get install -y libzmq3-dev
#> apt-get install -y python3

# Ubuntu 18
ravemanager::system_requirements("ubuntu", "18")
#> # Please consider the following system libraries under ubuntu-18
#> apt-get install -y software-properties-common
#> add-apt-repository -y ppa:cran/libgit2
#> apt-get update
#> apt-get install -y make
#> apt-get install -y cmake
#> apt-get install -y libicu-dev
#> apt-get install -y zlib1g-dev
#> apt-get install -y libcurl4-openssl-dev
#> apt-get install -y libssl-dev
#> apt-get install -y libfontconfig1-dev
#> apt-get install -y libfreetype6-dev
#> apt-get install -y libfribidi-dev
#> apt-get install -y libharfbuzz-dev
#> apt-get install -y libjpeg-dev
#> apt-get install -y libpng-dev
#> apt-get install -y libtiff-dev
#> apt-get install -y pandoc
#> apt-get install -y libxml2-dev
#> apt-get install -y git
#> apt-get install -y libgit2-dev
#> apt-get install -y libfftw3-dev
#> apt-get install -y libhdf5-dev
#> apt-get install -y libglpk-dev
#> apt-get install -y libgmp3-dev
#> apt-get install -y libzmq3-dev
#> apt-get install -y python3

# Ubuntu 16
ravemanager::system_requirements("ubuntu", "16")
#> # Please consider the following system libraries under ubuntu-16
#> apt-get install -y software-properties-common
#> add-apt-repository -y ppa:cran/libgit2
#> apt-get update
#> apt-get install -y make
#> apt-get install -y cmake
#> apt-get install -y libicu-dev
#> apt-get install -y zlib1g-dev
#> apt-get install -y libcurl4-openssl-dev
#> apt-get install -y libssl-dev
#> apt-get install -y libfontconfig1-dev
#> apt-get install -y libfreetype6-dev
#> apt-get install -y libfribidi-dev
#> apt-get install -y libharfbuzz-dev
#> apt-get install -y libjpeg-dev
#> apt-get install -y libpng-dev
#> apt-get install -y libtiff-dev
#> apt-get install -y pandoc
#> apt-get install -y libxml2-dev
#> apt-get install -y git
#> apt-get install -y libgit2-dev
#> apt-get install -y libfftw3-dev
#> apt-get install -y libhdf5-dev

#> apt-get install -y libgmp3-dev

#> apt-get install -y python3

# =============== On Red Hat Enterprise Linux ===============

# Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8
ravemanager::system_requirements("redhat", "8")
#> # Please consider the following system libraries under redhat-8
#> subscription-manager repos --enable codeready-builder-for-rhel-8-x86_64-rpms
#> dnf install -y https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-8.noarch.rpm
#> dnf install -y make
#> dnf install -y cmake
#> dnf install -y libicu-devel
#> dnf install -y zlib-devel
#> dnf install -y libcurl-devel
#> dnf install -y openssl-devel
#> dnf install -y fontconfig-devel
#> dnf install -y freetype-devel
#> dnf install -y fribidi-devel
#> dnf install -y harfbuzz-devel
#> dnf install -y libjpeg-turbo-devel
#> dnf install -y libpng-devel
#> dnf install -y libtiff-devel
#> dnf install -y libxml2-devel
#> dnf install -y git
#> dnf install -y libgit2-devel
#> dnf install -y fftw-devel
#> dnf install -y hdf5-devel
#> dnf install -y glpk-devel
#> dnf install -y gmp-devel
#> dnf install -y zeromq-devel
#> dnf install -y python2

# Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
ravemanager::system_requirements("redhat", "7")
#> # Please consider the following system libraries under redhat-7
#> rpm -q epel-release || yum install -y https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm
#> yum install -y make
#> yum install -y cmake
#> yum install -y libicu-devel
#> yum install -y zlib-devel
#> yum install -y libcurl-devel
#> yum install -y openssl-devel
#> yum install -y fontconfig-devel
#> yum install -y freetype-devel
#> yum install -y fribidi-devel
#> yum install -y harfbuzz-devel
#> yum install -y libjpeg-turbo-devel
#> yum install -y libpng-devel
#> yum install -y libtiff-devel
#> yum install -y pandoc
#> yum install -y libxml2-devel
#> yum install -y git
#> yum install -y libgit2-devel
#> yum install -y fftw-devel
#> yum install -y hdf5-devel
#> yum install -y glpk-devel
#> yum install -y gmp-devel
#> yum install -y zeromq-devel
#> yum install -y python

# =============== On CentOS ===============

# Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8
ravemanager::system_requirements("centos", "8")
#> # Please consider the following system libraries under centos-8
#> dnf install -y dnf-plugins-core
#> dnf config-manager --set-enabled powertools
#> dnf install -y epel-release
#> dnf install -y make
#> dnf install -y cmake
#> dnf install -y libicu-devel
#> dnf install -y zlib-devel
#> dnf install -y libcurl-devel
#> dnf install -y openssl-devel
#> dnf install -y fontconfig-devel
#> dnf install -y freetype-devel
#> dnf install -y fribidi-devel
#> dnf install -y harfbuzz-devel
#> dnf install -y libjpeg-turbo-devel
#> dnf install -y libpng-devel
#> dnf install -y libtiff-devel
#> dnf install -y pandoc
#> dnf install -y libxml2-devel
#> dnf install -y git
#> dnf install -y libgit2-devel
#> dnf install -y fftw-devel
#> dnf install -y hdf5-devel
#> dnf install -y glpk-devel
#> dnf install -y gmp-devel
#> dnf install -y zeromq-devel
#> dnf install -y python2

# Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7

#> # Please consider the following system libraries under centos-7
#> yum install -y epel-release
#> yum install -y make
#> yum install -y cmake
#> yum install -y libicu-devel
#> yum install -y zlib-devel
#> yum install -y libcurl-devel
#> yum install -y openssl-devel
#> yum install -y fontconfig-devel
#> yum install -y freetype-devel
#> yum install -y fribidi-devel
#> yum install -y harfbuzz-devel

# =============== On OpenSUSE ===============

# openSUSE 42.3
ravemanager::system_requirements("opensuse", "42")
#> # Please consider the following system libraries under opensuse-42
#> zypper install -y make
#> zypper install -y cmake
#> zypper install -y libicu-devel
#> zypper install -y zlib-devel
#> zypper install -y libcurl-devel
#> zypper install -y libopenssl-devel
#> zypper install -y fontconfig-devel
#> zypper install -y freetype2-devel
#> zypper install -y fribidi-devel
#> zypper install -y harfbuzz-devel
#> zypper install -y libjpeg8-devel
#> zypper install -y libpng16-compat-devel
#> zypper install -y libtiff-devel
#> zypper install -y pandoc
#> zypper install -y libxml2-devel
#> zypper install -y git
#> zypper install -y libgit2-devel
#> zypper install -y fftw3-devel
#> zypper install -y hdf5-devel
#> zypper install -y gmp-devel
#> zypper install -y zeromq-devel
#> zypper install -y python

# =============== On SUSE Linux Enterprise ===============

# SUSE Linux Enterprise 12.3
ravemanager::system_requirements("sle", "12")
#> # Please consider the following system libraries under sle-12
#> zypper install -y make
#> zypper install -y cmake
#> zypper install -y libicu-devel
#> zypper install -y zlib-devel
#> zypper install -y libcurl-devel
#> zypper install -y libopenssl-devel
#> zypper install -y fontconfig-devel
#> zypper install -y freetype2-devel
#> zypper install -y libjpeg8-devel
#> zypper install -y libpng16-compat-devel
#> zypper install -y libtiff-devel
#> zypper install -y libxml2-devel
#> zypper install -y git
#> zypper install -y libgit2-24
#> zypper install -y fftw3-devel
#> zypper install -y hdf5-devel
#> zypper install -y gmp-devel
#> zypper install -y zeromq-devel
#> zypper install -y python
